metadata.title: CVE-2020-13625 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
PHPMailer before 6.1.6 contains an output escaping bug when the name of afile attachment contains a double quote character. This can result in thefile type being misinterpreted by the receiver or any mail relay processingthe message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-phpmailer - 6.1.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libphp-phpmailer package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1.6-1').
